body: I'm riding my motorcycle across country and I come up on this blind hill and standing at the bottom is just these 2 fucking goats in the road and I didn't have enough time to slow down or fucking move out if the way so I just cracked the throughtle and this one goat jumped in front of me at the last second and I thought I was gonna fucking die but I blew the fucking thing in half I went right through it, I pulled over and the bottom of the bike was just covered with guts and shit and there was shit all over my pant legs, no blood just guts and shit, I vaporized the fucking goat.
